title: iOS Lead
tagsAndSkills: Computer science,Performance tuning,Resource optimization,Bluetooth,Usage,GIT,Monitoring tools,Multithreading

placeholders.label: Chennai, Pune, Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Kolkata

jobDescription:
Collaborate with designers to create compelling user interfaces, experiences and UI prototypes.
Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency and bring innovation to the app.
Develop an intrinsic understanding of the business and collaborate with the team to translate requirements to functional specifications.
Rigorous testing of the application to ensure it meets quality standards.
Actively participate in daily standups, team planning meetings, application demos, and other team meetings.
Actively participate in peer code reviews and internal technical workshops.
Take the ownership for your work from understanding the requirements and design, to implementation, testing, and maintenance.
Conduct interviews to hire new talent, and groom and train junior developers.
Proactive, have a problem solving mindset, critical thinking and great communication skills.
Basic Skills / Qualifications

1. BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field.
2. Proven experience in designing and developing iOS applications using MVVM, and Clean Architecture
3. Have published one or more iOS apps in the app store.
4. Proficient in Swift, Objective-C and Cocoa Touch.
5. Hands-on experience writing quality unit and integration tests.
6. Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Realm, Core Animation, XCTest etc.
7. Experience with offline storage, multi-threading, and performance tuning
8. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
9. Understanding of Apple s design principles and interface guidelines
10. Familiarity with push notifications and app extensions.
11. Proficient understanding of code versioning tools like Git.
12. Familiarity with CI/CD using Jenkins or AppCenter.

Preferred Skills / Qualifications
1. Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries.
2. Experience with resource optimization like Data-usage, Battery consumption etc, and performance monitoring tools.
3. Knack for benchmarking and optimization.
4. Experience with Bluetooth scanning, iBeacon technology is a huge plus.
5. Exposure to wearable app development (watchOS or other platforms) is a huge plus.
Education - Bachelors degree in science or engineering

title: Business Development Executive
tagsAndSkills: Direct sales,Manager Technology,Sales forecasting,SMB,Business Development Executive,Business modeling,Research,Enterprise software
jobDescription:
Join us as a Business Development Manager in our Sales team to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for selling Complete IT (Hardware+Software) products and services while focusing on developing new acquisition accounts and expanding existing accounts.

Responsibility:
  • Work with customers and innovative solutions to business opportunities.
  • Exceed sales and revenue targets through proactive client communications in SMB segment.
  • Prospecting and developing new business to acquire new Logos.
  • Understand of client s business functions, priorities, strategies, pain areas and solution options, and market trends and identify new business opportunities.
  • Develop account plans, updating the organization on what will be required to grow and retain the customer.
  • Establish clear contact plans with the customer to ensure that the business has appropriate relationships with technical, business management, influencers, and decision-makers.
  • Answer inbound emails and phone calls from internal and external customers
  • Be responsible to increase business with Enterprise sized accounts
  • Use in-depth knowledge of product, technology and services to become a trusted business advisor for customers and partners
  • Acquire and Retention of accounts, including account planning, sales forecasting, engaging cross-functional resources and working with the virtual teams to ensure alignment across the organizations
  • Regularly engage with decision makers at client facilities in performing primary duties
Essential Requirements:
  • Bachelors degree
  • Excellent verbal and written communication essential.
  • Direct Sales experience in Enterprise is highly desired
  • Experience working within the cloud, CSP, enterprise software industry and knowledge of cloud / SaaS business models is preferred
  • Ability to engage and influence C-level executives in end-customer organizations - including Government entities, Corporates and SMB.
  • Intermediate understanding of the full range of products and services
  • Previous experience in relationship selling
  • Ability to identify how Our products and services align to customer needs
  • Good understanding of computer technology
  • Excellent communication, presentation, and problem-solving skills
  • Research skills, curiosity about business components

Understanding the curriculum and implementing it in the class

We will provide you the necessary inputs and training to make you an awesome Teacher.

So if you wish to join us in our revolution, please write to us at poonam@mindseed.in (9702998232) aayushi.tripathi@vishwajyot.com (9324745974)
